statements: SELECT * FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT id, user_id FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT id, activity_description FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE user_id <= 50;
SELECT * FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, user_id, activity_description FROM intrusion_detection_system ORDER BY id ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, activity_description FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE id < 10;
SELECT * FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE activity_description LIKE '%intrusion%' AND user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY activity_description ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_description FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_description FROM intrusion_detection_system WHERE user_id = 2 OR user_id = 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tbl_user;
SELECT username, email FROM tbl_user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM tbl_user ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM tbl_activity_log WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM tbl_activity_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM tbl_user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tbl_user WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM tbl_activity_log WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM tbl_user;
SELECT username, email FROM tbl_user WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM tbl_activity_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id);
SELECT * FROM IntrusionEvents ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Unauthorized Access'
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_time FROM IntrusionEvents WHERE event_user = 'Admin' AND event_source = 'Server01'
SELECT * FROM AlertLog WHERE alert_description LIKE '%malicious%'
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, activity_user FROM SuspiciousActivities ORDER BY activity_time ASC
SELECT * FROM IntrusionEvents ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_description, event_source FROM IntrusionEvents WHERE event_id = 5
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_description, event_user FROM IntrusionEvents INNER JOIN AlertLog ON IntrusionEvents.event_user = AlertLog.alert_user
SELECT DISTINCT event_user FROM IntrusionEvents
SELECT * FROM intrusion_events;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM intrusion_events WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_user, event_time FROM intrusion_events ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM intrusion_alerts WHERE alert_severity > 3;
SELECT alert_description, alert_time, alert_status FROM intrusion_alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM intrusion_events WHERE event_type = 'DDoS' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_user FROM intrusion_events WHERE event_source_ip = '192.168.1.10' AND event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM intrusion_events GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM intrusion_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM intrusion_alerts WHERE alert_severity >= 4 AND alert_status = 'open' ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description FROM alerts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_time FROM activities WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name AS name, regulation_description AS description FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.activity_type FROM users u JOIN activities a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.role = 'user' AND a.activity_type = 'login';
SELECT a.activity_id, a.activity_type, sa.severity FROM activities a LEFT JOIN suspicious_activities sa ON a.activity_id = sa.activity_id WHERE sa.severity > 5;

SELECT r.regulation_name, r.regulation_description, COUNT(sa.activity_id) AS num_suspicious_activities FROM regulations r LEFT JOIN suspicious_activities sa ON r.regulation_id = sa.regulation_id GROUP BY r.regulation_name, r.regulation_description ORDER BY num_suspicious_activities DESC;
